original: bi shva m'a t'a s'a dha nam /
analyzed: bi shva m'a t'a s'a dha nam /

original: sna tshogs yum gyi sgrub thabs /
analyzed: sna tshogs yum gyi sgrub thabs /
translated: The Means of Achievement of Vishvam캐t캐

original: sna tshogs yum la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: sna tshogs yum la phyag 'tshal lo //

original: nyi ma zla ba'i dbus su a'a li k'a li dang bcas chu yi sa bon nyid la chu skyes bsgom //
analyzed: nyi ma zla ba'i dbus su a'a li k'a li dang bcas chu yi sa bon nyid la chu skyes bsgom //
translated: In the middle of the sun and moon, on the water seed syllable itself, one should meditate on the lotus.

original: de yis bskyed pa'i lha mo zhal gcig phyag gi chu skyes gnyis pa sku mdog zla ba lta bu ste //
analyzed: de yis bskyed pa'i lha mo zhal gcig phyag gi chu skyes gnyis pa sku mdog zla ba lta bu ste //
translated: The goddess generated from that has one face, two hands, and a second lotus, and her body is like the moon.

original: gdengs ka dkar po la gnas chu skyes dkar po'i phyag dang mi 'jigs pa dang na bza' dkar po mnabs //
analyzed: gdengs ka dkar po la gnas chu skyes dkar po'i phyag dang mi 'jigs pa dang na bza' dkar po mnabs //
translated: Her hand on the white lotus situated on the white hood, and she wears the gesture of fearlessness and white garments.

original: rgyan rnams dkar po dang ldan zhal ni shin tu 'dzum zhing bsgrub bya'i khyim du rab tu bsrings nas ni //游댷de nas bsgrub bya blangs nas slar yang gtso bo'i dkyil @155a * //
analyzed: rgyan rnams dkar po dang ldan zhal ni shin tu 'dzum zhing bsgrub bya'i khyim du rab tu bsrings nas ni // de nas bsgrub bya blangs nas slar yang gtso bo'i dkyil @155a * //
translated: She is endowed with white ornaments, her face is very smiling, and she extends to the house of the one to be accomplished.

original: 'khor lo ni yang dag rab tu zhugs gyur nas //
analyzed: 'khor lo ni yang dag rab tu zhugs gyur nas //
translated: Then, having taken the one to be accomplished, she again enters into the principal mandala.

original: gtso bo'i bka' yis rab tu thob pa'i slar yang bdud rtsi bum pas spyan ma la sogs rab dgyes pas //
analyzed: gtso bo'i bka' yis rab tu thob pa'i slar yang bdud rtsi bum pas spyan ma la sogs rab dgyes pas //
translated: The principal one, having obtained the command, again with the vase of nectar, Locan캐 and so forth, being greatly pleased,

original: bsgrub bya de la khrus mdzad rab mchog nus ma rnam pa bcu po rnams kyis yang dag mchod par byed /
analyzed: bsgrub bya de la khrus mdzad rab mchog nus ma rnam pa bcu po rnams kyis yang dag mchod par byed /
translated: perform the ablution of the one to be accomplished, and the ten aspects of the supreme heroines make offerings.

original: gzugs la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams kyis rgyas byed rab mchog stobs bcu la sogs rnams kyis mnyes par byed //
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams kyis rgyas byed rab mchog stobs bcu la sogs rnams kyis mnyes par byed //
translated: The goddesses of form and so forth, the supreme heroines, the ten powers and so forth, please.

original: 'byung por bshad pas mi 'jigs byed cing rab mchog rnam pa bcu yi khro bo las skyes rnams kyis skyong //
analyzed: 'byung por bshad pas mi 'jigs byed cing rab mchog rnam pa bcu yi khro bo las skyes rnams kyis skyong //
translated: The ten aspects of the wrathful ones, born from the supreme heroines, protect, not fearing the bh콞tas.

original: kru mo rnams kyis 'o ni yang dag byed cing mi yi bu mo lo ni bcu gnyis ma pang 'khyud //
analyzed: kru mo rnams kyis 'o ni yang dag byed cing mi yi bu mo lo ni bcu gnyis ma pang 'khyud //
translated: The heroines, kissing, embrace the human maiden, twelve years old.

original: gtum po rnams kyis srung bar byed cing sa steng mtha' dag rnams su rgyas par bya ba'i don gyi phyir //
analyzed: gtum po rnams kyis srung bar byed cing sa steng mtha' dag rnams su rgyas par bya ba'i don gyi phyir //
translated: The fierce ones protect, for the sake of expansion throughout the entire earth.

original: de bzhin bsgrub bya'i ma lus mchog gi bde ba bya phyir 'di ni rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom par bya //
analyzed: de bzhin bsgrub bya'i ma lus mchog gi bde ba bya phyir 'di ni rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom par bya //
translated: Likewise, for the sake of the supreme bliss of all those to be accomplished, this should be cultivated by the yog캶.

original: sna tshogs yum gyi sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
analyzed: sna tshogs yum gyi sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
translated: The s캐dhana of Vi콑vam캐t캐 is complete.
